title: Sign-to-text and speech Transcriber using Python
description: Developed an innovative Python-based Sign-to-Text and Speech Transcriber using OpenCV and gtts, for the Deaf and Mute community; by converting sign language to text and speech.

title: ECELL-FCRIT E-Summit Websit
description: Worked alongside two team members to develop the website using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to ensure its design and functionality met our objectives effectively.

title: Website Project for a BMC/BARC Contractor
description: Executed the development and launch of an Informational Website Project for a BMC/BARC Contractor showcasing past projects and services using HTML, CSS, Reactjs, Expressjs, and Nodejs.
